alert.note: Alert for Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 9:07PM CST until January 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Wintry Mix Tuesday Morning... .A quick hitting wintry mix of snow, freezing rain and rain will progress into portions of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin before daybreak Tuesday. A glaze of ice accumulation could lead to slippery road conditions in spots. Additionally, snow accumulations of up to 1 inch are possible. Precipitation should move east of the area by the afternoon. Be prepared for impacts to the Tuesday morning commute. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO NOON CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 1 inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Iowa, Fayette and Clayton Counties. In Wisconsin, Grant County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Iowa, visit 511ia.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
